entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:51 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:51 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:51 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023
